name: Hentai Breakout City
description:
Welcome to Hentai Breakout City, an Indie game based on the classic Breakout.

OBJECTIVES


Your objective is to break all the blocks.
For each number of blocks eliminated you remove a piece of clothing from the character's level.
Beat each level to unlock items in the gallery and other levels.

FEATURES


• Power Ups
• Different girl in each level.
• Browse the gallery with one hand.
